name: Cashfree Payments
headline: Next-gen digital payments provider for India.
description:
Cashfree is a next-generation payments company for Indian businesses. 

Cashfree helps 50,000+ businesses collect and send money with solutions such as an easy to integrate payment gateway that supports instant settlements & refunds; Payouts - an API banking platform for bulk disbursals; a split payment solution for marketplaces; a Bank Account Verification API; a dedicated UPI stack for businesses and Auto Collect - a virtual account solution to match inbound payments to customers. It counts Xiaomi, Nykaa, Zomato, Zoomcar, Cred, Swiggy, Shell, Zepto, Dunzo as well as donation platforms like Ketto and Milaap amongst its customers.

Cashfree is a licensed payment aggregator in India and works with all leading banks to build the core payments and banking infrastructure that powers Cashfree’s products. Cashfree is also integrated with major platforms like Shopify, Wix, Paypal, Amazon Pay, Ola Money and Google Pay.

### Why should I choose Cashfree Payments?
Cashfree Payments is India’s leading payments and API banking company. It helps 8,00,000+ businesses accept and send money and is used for multiple use cases like vendor payouts, wage payouts, bulk refunds, etc.
Cashfree Payments offers the widest range of solutions including API banking platform [Payouts](https://www.cashfree.com/</payouts/>) that helps businesses send money instantly 24x7 to any bank accounts, UPI ID, card, or wallet with a simple API that businesses can integrate with their product, instead of uploading complicated files on corporate banking portal.
Cashfree Payments also offers an advanced [payment gateway ](https://www.cashfree.com/</payment-gateway-india/>)with features like [instant refunds](https://www.cashfree.com/</instant-refunds/>), [card-preauthorization](https://www.cashfree.com/</preauthorization/>), etc among other products.
Cashfree Payments is integrated with major platforms like [Shopify](https://www.cashfree.com/</shopify-payment-gateway-india/>), Paypal , Amazon Pay, Google Pay, and Ola money (wallet and postpaid both) among others.
### How to get started on Cashfree Payments?
We do 100% paperless onboarding for merchants on Cashfree Payments. Follow the below steps for quick account activation and start using Cashfree Payments in no time:
1. [Create your account](https://www.cashfree.com/<https:/merchant.cashfree.com/merchants/signup>) on Cashfree Payments
2. Update your business profile and upload scanned copies of business documents
3. Choose the product you are interested in. You can switch to Test Environment and try out the product features and integrations using test API credentials. Once ready, you can switch to Production Environment. 
4. Once you create your account, our payment expert will call you in the next 24 working hours, share your business requirement and we will help you pick the right set of features.
5. Once the account is verified, you will receive an account activation confirmation email. For more details refer to our [account activation guide](https://www.cashfree.com/<https:/docs.cashfree.com/docs/activate-account>). 
### How long would it take to activate my account?
Once your documents are submitted for review, account gets activated with 24 working hours. Please refer to our [quick activation guide](https://www.cashfree.com/<https:/docs.cashfree.com/docs/activate-account>). You can also write to us at care@cashfree.com.
### How is Cashfree Payment Gateway different from other payment gateways in India?
[Cashfree Payment Gateway](https://www.cashfree.com/</payment-gateway-india/>) offers 180+ payment modes including Pay Later, Paytm, and Cardless EMI options etc. Cashfree Payment Gateway is the only payment gateway that supports [instant refunds](https://www.cashfree.com/</instant-refunds/>) versus the industry standard of refunds in 5-7 working days - this ensures Cashfree Payments merchants are able to delight their customers while running business operations smoothly.
### Can I start accepting international payments using Cashfree Payments?
Yes, it is possible to enable international payments on Cashfree Payment Gateway. You can talk to us and help us understand your business for quick activation. If you have a Paypal account, [connect Paypal to your Cashfree Payments account](https://www.cashfree.com/<https:/docs.cashfree.com/docs/payment-gateway-dashboard#paypal>) and start offering Paypal as a checkout option on the payment page instantly.
### What is Payouts?
[Payouts](https://www.cashfree.com/</payouts/>) by Cashfree Payments is a payment disbursal platform used by businesses to do bulk payouts. When you create a Payouts account, Cashfree Payments creates a virtual wallet for you. You can add funds from your bank accounts to the wallet and use the funds to do payouts. You can use the Payouts dashboard to do single or bulk payouts via excel upload or integrate Payouts APIs with your product or ERP to automate bulk payouts.
### Can I get tailored pricing for my business?
Yes, you can connect with our team to discuss your business requirement and get tailored pricing depending on the nature of your business and the volume of transactions. For more details, [contact us](https://www.cashfree.com/</contact-sales/?source-action=Home%20page>) or visit the [pricing page](https://www.cashfree.com/</payment-gateway-charges/>).

### Why should I choose Cashfree Payments?
Cashfree Payments is India’s leading payments and API banking company. It helps 8,00,000+ businesses accept and send money and is used for multiple use cases like vendor payouts, wage payouts, bulk refunds, etc.
Cashfree Payments offers the widest range of solutions including API banking platform Payouts⟨71⟩ that helps businesses send money instantly 24x7 to any bank accounts, UPI ID, card, or wallet with a simple API that businesses can integrate with their product, instead of uploading complicated files on corporate banking portal.
Cashfree Payments also offers an advanced payment gateway ⟨72⟩with features like instant refunds⟨73⟩, card-preauthorization⟨74⟩, etc among other products.
Cashfree Payments is integrated with major platforms like Shopify⟨6⟩, Paypal , Amazon Pay, Google Pay, and Ola money (wallet and postpaid both) among others.
### How to get started on Cashfree Payments?
We do 100% paperless onboarding for merchants on Cashfree Payments. Follow the below steps for quick account activation and start using Cashfree Payments in no time:
1. Create your account⟨75⟩ on Cashfree Payments
2. Update your business profile and upload scanned copies of business documents
3. Choose the product you are interested in. You can switch to Test Environment and try out the product features and integrations using test API credentials. Once ready, you can switch to Production Environment. 
4. Once you create your account, our payment expert will call you in the next 24 working hours, share your business requirement and we will help you pick the right set of features.
5. Once the account is verified, you will receive an account activation confirmation email. For more details refer to our account activation guide⟨76⟩. 
### How long would it take to activate my account?
Once your documents are submitted for review, account gets activated with 24 working hours. Please refer to our quick activation guide⟨76⟩. You can also write to us at care@cashfree.com.
### How is Cashfree Payment Gateway different from other payment gateways in India?
Cashfree Payment Gateway⟨72⟩ offers 180+ payment modes including Pay Later, Paytm, and Cardless EMI options etc. Cashfree Payment Gateway is the only payment gateway that supports instant refunds⟨73⟩ versus the industry standard of refunds in 5-7 working days - this ensures Cashfree Payments merchants are able to delight their customers while running business operations smoothly.
### Can I start accepting international payments using Cashfree Payments?
Yes, it is possible to enable international payments on Cashfree Payment Gateway. You can talk to us and help us understand your business for quick activation. If you have a Paypal account, connect Paypal to your Cashfree Payments account⟨77⟩ and start offering Paypal as a checkout option on the payment page instantly.
### What is Payouts?
Payouts⟨71⟩ by Cashfree Payments is a payment disbursal platform used by businesses to do bulk payouts. When you create a Payouts account, Cashfree Payments creates a virtual wallet for you. You can add funds from your bank accounts to the wallet and use the funds to do payouts. You can use the Payouts dashboard to do single or bulk payouts via excel upload or integrate Payouts APIs with your product or ERP to automate bulk payouts.
### Can I get tailored pricing for my business?
Yes, you can connect with our team to discuss your business requirement and get tailored pricing depending on the nature of your business and the volume of transactions. For more details, contact us⟨78⟩ or visit the pricing page⟨25⟩.

### Cashfree Payments: A Next-Gen Payments Provider

**Overview**  
Cashfree Payments, founded in Bengaluru, India, emerges as a leading player in the digital payments landscape, catering predominantly to Indian businesses. Initially launched as "Cashfree," the company has grown into a robust payments ecosystem that supports over 50,000 businesses. These range from e-commerce giants like Xiaomi, Nykaa, and Zomato to various charitable organizations, exemplifying its versatile reach.

**Mission**  
Their mission is clear: to be the next-gen digital payments provider for India, simplifying and enhancing the payment experience for businesses and their customers.

**Products and Services**  
Cashfree offers an impressive suite of payment solutions designed to cater to diverse business needs:

1. **Payment Gateway** - A seamless gateway for businesses to accept payments with instant settlements and refunds.
2. **Payouts** - An API-driven platform for easy bulk payments to banks, wallets, and UPI.
3. **Split Payments** - Tailored for marketplaces to manage multiple vendor payments.
4. **Bank Account Verification API** - Secure and efficient verification of bank details.
5. **Dedicated UPI Stack** - A specific solution for UPI transactions to streamline payments.
6. **Auto Collect** - A virtual account solution that helps match incoming payments to respective customers.

These tools are designed to not just facilitate transactions but to optimize them for speed and reliability.

**Industry Position**  
Cashfree operates as a licensed payment aggregator in India, collaborating with leading banks to establish a solid payments infrastructure. Their integration with major platforms like Shopify and Paypal positions them well within the ecosystem, fostering an environment of adaptability and scalability for their users.

**Team and Support**  
With a dedicated team of 200 employees and backed by key players like Y Combinator and various venture partners, Cashfree is equipped to deliver exceptional support, ensuring that client success is paramount. Michael Seibel serves as a pivotal Group Partner, steering the platform towards continuous innovation.

**Performance Metrics**  
Cashfree boasts impressive performance statistics:
- Over **8,00,000 businesses served**
- Annually processes **over USD 80 billion**
- Supports **over 600 million bank accounts**, demonstrating its formidable scale and capability.

**The Bottom Line**  
For any business looking to grow in today's digital landscape, Cashfree Payments offers a comprehensive, robust, and efficient solution for transactions. They embody a forward-thinking approach in a sector that is rapidly evolving, making them a go-to for many seeking to simplify payments in India. To get started or to learn more, visit [Cashfree Payments](https://www.cashfree.com).
